message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite comfortable with $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $775000. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $800000. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $780000. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $785000. What do you think?

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $780000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $790000. What do you think?

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $780000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you consider that?
